CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Coast relative to Crimson Peaks?
SRP.A: Azure Coast is {above} Crimson Peaks in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total housing affordability index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crimson Peaks}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total housing affordability index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Azure Coast}.

VE.Q: What is Azure Coast's Housing Affordability Index in 1980?
VE.A: Azure Coast's housing affordability index in 1980 is {118.09} index.

VE.Q: What is Crimson Peaks's Housing Affordability Index in 1976?
VE.A: Crimson Peaks's housing affordability index in 1976 is {113.08} index.

VE.Q: What is Azure Coast's Housing Affordability Index in 1974?
VE.A: Azure Coast's housing affordability index in 1974 is {121.57} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Housing Affordability Index in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum housing affordability index is {75.25} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Housing Affordability Index in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum housing affordability index is {164.14} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Housing Affordability Index level recorded for Azure Coast?
EVJ.A: Azure Coast reached approximately {126.47} index in {1979}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Housing Affordability Index level recorded for Azure Coast?
EVJ.A: Azure Coast's lowest recorded level is approximately {75.25} index in {1982}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Housing Affordability Index?
SC.A: The average total housing affordability index is {234.89} index.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Housing Affordability Index go below 223.27 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Housing Affordability Index fall between 224.62 and 248.27 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Housing Affordability Index exceed 249.61 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1985, did the total Housing Affordability Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1984 and 1985?
NC.A: The change in total housing affordability index between 1978 and 1985 was {larger} than between 1984 and 1985.

NC.Q: Between 1975 and 1982, did the total Housing Affordability Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1980 and 1984?
NC.A: The change in total housing affordability index between 1975 and 1982 was {smaller} than between 1980 and 1984.

NC.Q: Was the total Housing Affordability Index in 1979 higher or lower than in 1982?
NC.A: The total housing affordability index in 1979 was {higher} than in 1982.

NC.Q: Was the total Housing Affordability Index in 1978 higher or lower than in 1980?
NC.A: The total housing affordability index in 1978 was {lower} than in 1980.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Crimson Peaks} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Azure Coast, Crimson Peaks}.
